paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the establishment of two patient-derived pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma cell lines, LuPanc-1 and LuPanc-2, and includes information on genetic variants, specifically noting a nonsense mutation in the BRCA2 gene.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 variant is a nonsense mutation, which typically leads to a truncated protein and loss of function.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in the LuPanc-1 cell line derived from a patient with pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the BRCA2 gene was reported in the paper.
